Html:
Is there an option to delete a content page yet? I didn't see it next to the icons that allow to Add or Edit.

Thanks
Vin

There is a delete option sometimes.  :)  See my explaination over on this other thread.

http://oxite.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=49132

The way we implemented that feature wasn't the greatest and we'll make it better and more clear in the next version.
